price: አለ «ጌታዬ በእርሱ ያስመቸኝ ሀብት (ከናንተ ግብር) በላጭ ነው፡፡ ስለዚህ በጉልበት እገዙኝ፡፡ በእናንተና በእነሱ መካከል ብርቱን ግድብ አደርጋለሁና፡፡
arabic: قَالَ مَا مَكَّنِّي فِيهِ رَبِّي خَيۡرٞ فَأَعِينُونِي بِقُوَّةٍ أَجۡعَلۡ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ رَدۡمًا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla mā makkannī fīhi rabbī khayrun fa-aʿīnūnī biquwwatin ajʿal baynakum wabaynahum radman
